title: MY ACCOUNT GOT HACKED
body: OMFG, somebody in my friend list sent me a message " click for free RP" then clicked on it, typed the email, username and password to received the free RP. After that they said i will receive it for 6 hours. I logged in and i realized my account got hacked. I tried to take back my account by email but i didnt received any emails from RIOT to change my password, im really hopeless now. I TRIED FOR MILLIONS TIME TO CHANGE IT BUT I DIDNT RECEIVE ANY EMAILS FROM RIOT. What can i do now bc that account is really important T_T i wanna kill myself

It sounds like you were victim to a phishing scam, but don't worry we can help!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can look into getting your account back as well as repairs.  This form will allow you to input an email that you have access to.  Rest easy, we got your back!
